title: Omicron variant may hasten pace for COVID-19 to become endemic, ‘ideal situation for a virus’
content:
1. Omicron variant may hasten pace for COVID-19 to become endemic, ‘ideal situation for a virus’  Yahoo News
  2. Omicron variant more transmissible than Delta -CDC director  Reuters
  3. CDC chief says omicron cases expected to grow, White House remains 'confident' schools will stay open  Fox News
  4. What we know about the severity of omicron and possibility of 'triple whammy' this winter  PBS NewsHour
  5. What makes omicron spread so quickly? A new study offers a tantalizing clue : Goats and Soda  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オミクロン変種がCOVID-19の流行ペースを早める可能性、「ウイルスにとって理想的な状況」。
